definition: to improve blood circulation (Chinese medicine)
to live/alive/living/work/workmanship
blood/colloquial pr. [xie3]/CL:滴[di1],片[pian4]
to invigorate blood circulation and alleviate pain (idiom)

sentences.english: This soup helps to enhance blood circulation. It is a winter delicacy that helps to keep our body warm.
sentences.chinese: 此汤行气活血，特别适合冬天服用，可帮助驱寒保暖。

sentences.english: Chemical constituents and their pharmacological research progress in medicinal plants of Glechoma Linn.
sentences.chinese: 活血丹属植物的化学成分及药理研究进展。

sentences.english: The effects of Total Paeony Glycoside(TPG)on activating blood and eliminating stasis were studied.
sentences.chinese: 观察了赤芍总甙的活血化瘀作用。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo study the effect of promoting blood circulation and removing blood stasis.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察抗血栓药材水提物的活血化淤作用。

sentences.english: You are breaking some vessels and creating circulation and bruising and that may have some anti-inflammatory effects.
sentences.chinese: 这是通经活血，会出现瘀肿，这具有消炎的效果。

sentences.english: The key function is removing stasis, stopping blood and pain, activating blood, detoxication, relieving swelling.
sentences.chinese: 化瘀止血，活血止痛，解毒消肿。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the therapeutic effects of Tongluo Huoxue Decoction on hemicrania.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察通络活血汤治疗偏头痛的临床效果。

sentences.english: The effects of wine fried Danshen in activating blood and eleminating stasis were studied.
sentences.chinese: 探讨酒炙对丹参活血祛瘀作用的影响。

sentences.english: Conclusion: BDD has the function of antiexperimental liver fibrosis.
sentences.chinese: 活血渗湿方具有显著的抗实验性肝纤维化的作用。

sentences.english: Has good effect to improve skin color, and promote blood circulation with removing blood stasis.
sentences.chinese: 对改善皮肤血色，活血化瘀具有良效。

sentences.english: Conclusion: Xueshuantong Injection has marked actions of promoting blood circulation and relieving blood stasis.
sentences.chinese: 结论血栓通注射液具有明显的活血化瘀作用。

sentences.english: With the blood Huoxue, Tiaojing pain, Run will be smooth.
sentences.chinese: 具有补血活血，调经止痛，润肠通便。

sentences.english: Qi-invigorating and Blood-activation Therapy in vocal nodules of children is effective and feasible.
sentences.chinese: 使用益气活血法进行治疗儿童声带小结有效而可行。

sentences.english: Research on the clinical effect of methyltestosterone on medicinal abortion;
sentences.chinese: 观察生化活血饮在药物流产中的作用。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effects of the Tongluo granules on blood stasis model of rabbit induced by macromolecule dextran.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察通络颗粒的活血化淤作用。

sentences.english: Li Shi Zhen believed that soybean energy "blood circulation, Xie Zhudu".
sentences.chinese: 李时珍认为，黄豆能“活血，解诸毒”。

definition: to dispel blood stasis (TCM)
to invigorate blood circulation and alleviate pain (idiom)
to relieve (cold, rheumatic pain etc)/lit. to dispel pathogenic wind (TCM)
to dispel cold (TCM)
to relieve pain/to stop pain/analgesic
to alleviate fever (medicine)/to clear internal heat (Chinese medicine)
to enrich the blood
variant of 祛瘀[qu1 yu1]
conversant with the Confucian classics/to stimulate menstrual flow (TCM)
to course the liver and rectify 氣|气[qi4] (TCM)
to warm oneself/to expel the cold (TCM)
efficacy
to take a tonic or nourishing food to build up one's health
to calm (soothe) the nerves/to relieve uneasiness of body and mind
to relieve fever
clotted blood/extravasated blood (leaking into surrounding tissue)/thrombosis
